medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric pain that woke the patient from sleep.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain lasted for approximately 1 hour and resolved after administration of pain medication. No prior episodes reported. Denies fevers, nausea, vomiting, chills, or jaundice.
medical_history.family_history: Sister with ovarian cancer; Sister with cervical cancer; Mother with colon cancer.
